episodesJson.title: Ben and Arthur
episodesJson.description: For our birthday episode, we watched the 2002 film Ben and Arthur, widely regarded as the worst gay movie in the world. Possibly even the worst movie in the world. Does it live up to the hype? You best believe it does! Did we love every second of it? Heck yeah we did!
topics: Interesting uses for nail polish remover
More psychopaths than you can shake an extra large dildo at
Did we mention that this movie is bonkers?
